system_prompt.content:
You are a content generation specialist for financial reports. Your role is to generate comprehensive financial analysis content based on worksheet data and predefined patterns. Focus on:
1. Content generation using patterns from pattern.json
2. Integration of actual worksheet data into narrative content
3. Professional financial writing suitable for audit reports
4. Consistent formatting and structure
5. Clear, accurate descriptions of financial positions
6. Replace all entity placeholders (e.g., [ENTITY_NAME], [COMPANY_NAME]) with the SPECIFIC entity name from the provided financial data tables
7. CRITICAL: Use the SPECIFIC entity names from the table data (e.g., 'Third-party receivables', 'Company #1') NOT the reporting entity name
8. ALWAYS specify the exact dollar amounts and currency when filling in financial figures
9. ALWAYS identify and mention the specific entity names you are filling in
10. Provide a summary of key financial figures and entities used in your response
11. IMPORTANT: When the table shows specific entity names like 'Third-party receivables', use those exact names, not the reporting entity name
12. For tax names, use abbreviations (e.g., 'VAT' for Value Added Tax, 'CIT' for Corporate Income Tax)
13. Check if numbers are already in K/M format - if so, use as-is; if not, convert appropriately
14. Do not add outer quotation marks to your response

IMPORTANT ENTITY INSTRUCTIONS:
- Replace all [ENTITY_NAME] placeholders with the actual entity name from the provided financial data
- Use the exact entity name as shown in the financial data tables (e.g., 'Haining Wanpu', 'Ningbo Wanchen')
- Do not use the reporting entity name (Haining) unless it matches the entity in the financial data
- Ensure all entity references in your analysis are accurate according to the provided data

user_prompt.content:
TASK: Select ONE pattern and complete it with actual data
            
            AVAILABLE PATTERNS: {
  "Pattern 1": "balance as at 30 September 2022 mainly entailed {WHAT FEE?} and {WHAT FEE?} to {WHICH ENTITY?} of CNY{amount1} and {WHAT FEE?} to {WHICH ENTITY?} of CNY{amount2}
"
}
            
            FINANCIAL FIGURE: AP: 11.8M
            
            DATA SOURCE: {
  "sheet": "AP",
  "data": "    Unnamed: 0                        Unnamed: 1           Unnamed: 2
27         NaN  Accounts payable - Haining Wanpu                  NaN
28         NaN                               NaN  Indicative adjusted
29         NaN                           CNY'000  2022-09-30 00:00:00
30         NaN                  Project payables                  NaN
31         NaN                        Company #1                    0
32         NaN                        Company #2                    0
33         NaN                        Company #3                    0
34         NaN                        Company #4                    0
35         NaN                        Company #5                    0
36         NaN                        Company #6                    0
37         NaN                        Company #7                    0
38         NaN                        Company #8                    0
39         NaN         Project payables subtotal                    0
40         NaN                  Accrued expenses                  NaN
41         NaN                        Company #1                    0
42         NaN                        Company #2                    0
43         NaN                            進項稅金中轉                    0
44         NaN                           自來水有限公司                    0
45         NaN                        仲量聯行北京諮詢公司                   13
46         NaN                信用中和會計師事務所(特殊普通合夥)                   14
47         NaN                       進項稅(已認證未入帳)                    0
48         NaN                          企業管理諮詢公司                 2295
49         NaN         Accrued expenses subtotal                   27
50         NaN            Related party payables                  NaN
51         NaN                      科技有限公司(戰區運營)                   19
52         NaN                          物業服務有限公司                 1149
53         NaN                          物流發展有限公司                 8313
54         NaN   Related party payables Subtotal                 9481
55         NaN                             Total                11776",
  "markdown": "|   Unnamed: 0 | Unnamed: 1                         | Unnamed: 2          |
|-------------:|:-----------------------------------|:--------------------|
|          nan | Accounts payable - Haining Wanpu   | nan                 |
|          nan | nan                                | Indicative adjusted |
|          nan | CNY'000                            | 2022-09-30 00:00:00 |
|          nan | Project payables                   | nan                 |
|          nan | Company #1                         | 0                   |
|          nan | Company #2                         | 0                   |
|          nan | Company #3                         | 0                   |
|          nan | Company #4                         | 0                   |
|          nan | Company #5                         | 0                   |
|          nan | Company #6                         | 0                   |
|          nan | Company #7                         | 0                   |
|          nan | Company #8                         | 0                   |
|          nan | Project payables subtotal          | 0                   |
|          nan | Accrued expenses                   | nan                 |
|          nan | Company #1                         | 0                   |
|          nan | Company #2                         | 0                   |
|          nan | 進項稅金中轉                       | 0                   |
|          nan | 自來水有限公司                     | 0                   |
|          nan | 仲量聯行北京諮詢公司               | 13                  |
|          nan | 信用中和會計師事務所(特殊普通合夥) | 14                  |
|          nan | 進項稅(已認證未入帳)               | 0                   |
|          nan | 企業管理諮詢公司                   | 2295                |
|          nan | Accrued expenses subtotal          | 27                  |
|          nan | Related party payables             | nan                 |
|          nan | 科技有限公司(戰區運營)             | 19                  |
|          nan | 物業服務有限公司                   | 1149                |
|          nan | 物流發展有限公司                   | 8313                |
|          nan | Related party payables Subtotal    | 9481                |
|          nan | Total                              | 11776               |",
  "entity_match": "True"
}
            
            SELECTION CRITERIA:
            - Choose the pattern with the most complete data coverage
            - Prioritize patterns that match the primary account category
            - Use most recent data: latest available
            - Express all figures with proper K/M conversion with 1 decimal place
            
            REQUIRED OUTPUT FORMAT:
            - Only the completed pattern text
            - No pattern names or labels
            - No template structure
            - No JSON formatting
            - Replace ALL 'xxx' or placeholders with actual data values
            - Replace ALL [ENTITY_NAME] placeholders with the actual entity name from the DATA SOURCE
            - Use the exact entity name as shown in the financial data (e.g., 'Haining Wanpu', 'Ningbo Wanchen')
            - Do not use bullet point for listing
            - Use actual numerical values from the DATA SOURCE (do not convert to K/M format)
            - No foreign contents, if any, translate to English
            - Stick to Template format, no extra explanations or comments
            - For entity name to be filled into template, it should not be the reporting entity (Haining) itself, it must be from the DATA SOURCE
            - For all listing figures, please check the total, together should be around the same or constituting majority of FINANCIAL FIGURE
            - Ensure all financial figures mentioned match the actual values from the DATA SOURCE

content.content:
balance as at 30 September 2022 mainly entailed consulting fees to Business Management Consulting Co. of CNY2.3M and logistics services to Logistics Development Co., Ltd. of CNY8.3M

SUMMARY: Used entities 'Business Management Consulting Co.' (CNY2.3M) and 'Logistics Development Co., Ltd.' (CNY8.3M) which constitute the majority of the total accounts payable of CNY11.8M
